allow:
Bash(do python -c "
import json
from collections import OrderedDict

with open\(''$file'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)

male_before = len\(data[''first_names''][''male'']\)
female_before = len\(data[''first_names''][''female'']\)
neutral_before = len\(data[''first_names''][''neutral'']\)

data[''first_names''][''male''] = list\(OrderedDict.fromkeys\(data[''first_names''][''male'']\)\)
data[''first_names''][''female''] = list\(OrderedDict.fromkeys\(data[''first_names''][''female'']\)\)
data[''first_names''][''neutral''] = list\(OrderedDict.fromkeys\(data[''first_names''][''neutral'']\)\)

male_after = len\(data[''first_names''][''male'']\)
female_after = len\(data[''first_names''][''female'']\)
neutral_after = len\(data[''first_names''][''neutral'']\)

print\(f''=== $file ===''\)
print\(f''  Male: {male_before} -> {male_after} \(removed {male_before - male_after}\)''\)
print\(f''  Female: {female_before} -> {female_after} \(removed {female_before - female_after}\)''\)
print\(f''  Neutral: {neutral_before} -> {neutral_after} \(removed {neutral_before - neutral_after}\)''\)
print\(f''  Total: {male_after + female_after + neutral_after}''\)

if male_before != male_after or female_before != female_after or neutral_before != neutral_after:
    with open\(''$file'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
        json.dump\(data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2\)
    print\(''  File updated.''\)
else:
    print\(''  No duplicates found.''\)
")
